mapper.select: SELECT pay_no, prod_name, r.price, p.prod_no, pay_date, pay_type, p.user_id FROM payments p JOIN products r ON(p.prod_no = r.prod_no) WHERE pay_type='ready' AND p.user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE payments SET pay_type='success', pay_date = sysdate WHERE pay_no = #{payNo}
mapper.select: SELECT pay_no, prod_name, r.price, p.prod_no, pay_date, pay_type, pdf, category_name, down_cnt, p.user_id FROM payments p JOIN products r ON(p.prod_no = r.prod_no) JOIN category c ON(r.category_no = c.category_no) WHERE pay_type='success' AND p.user_id=#{user_id}
